## Checklist
- [ ] My pack.json follows the [pack template](../templates/pack-template.json)
- [ ] All required fields are filled in (id, name, version, author, tags)
- [ ] Tags are valid categories or use the `custom:` prefix
- [ ] I have added/updated the README.md for my pack
- [ ] I have tested my filter rules locally
- [ ] My changes follow the [contribution guidelines](../CONTRIBUTING.md)
